DOC.brief_summary: In Assisted Reproductive Techniques ( ART ) need luteal support use progesterone , estrogen probably human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) . The optimal route administration dose yet determine . The aim study investigate whether high level mid-luteal serum progesterone relate high pregnancy rate ART cycle . We also plan investigate whether use high dos vaginal progesterone result higher pregnancy rate .
DOC.brief_title: Relationship Between Mid-luteal Serum Progesterone Levels Pregnancy Rates Assisted Reproductive Techniques ( ART )
DOC.criteria: Midluteal serum progesterone level 15 ng/dl Does sign consent form
